title: Formata???
content:
Anyone know the sans serif text at the bottom? Thinking Formata. . . ?  
Sorry about the small size, all I can do at this point.

Cheers

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908122646im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_4732.jpg)

edit

Not Formata, here is a close up of the word “River” . . . any ideas. . .

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908122646im_/http:/typophile.com/files/river_4549.jpg)

author: James Scriven

comments.content: Yep, Gill Sans Light, I reckon.
Didnt even think to look there. . . cheers guys
